body: Hi. Im sure I am right in saying that nexus was a great gamemode and many loved it. This is a petition to bring it back. Help me and sign this (By commenting) and hopefully we can get it back!
body_tagged: Hi. Im sure I am right in saying that nexus was a great gamemode and many loved it. This is a petition to bring it back. Help me and sign this (By commenting) and hopefully we can get it back!
title: BRING BACK NEXUS

replies.body:

replies.body: Almost no one play there, so for now it is closed cause of server keeping high price.
replies.body_tagged: Almost no one play there, so for now it is closed cause of server keeping high price.

replies.body:
Would you rather shut down unplayed servers in order to save money and make way for the new, long awaited ones arriving in the near future? 

I certainly would despite Nexus and CTH being old favourites, it's time for change. Be excited!
replies.body_tagged:
Would you rather shut down unplayed servers in order to save money and make way for the new, long awaited ones arriving in the near future? 

I certainly would despite Nexus and CTH being old favourites, it's time for change. Be excited!

replies.body: As much as I would love to bring bring back Nexus, not going to happen.  It was almost impossible to get another person to join.  Sometimes I would wait ten minutes for someone to join.  All we can hope now is the new game modes in Atlas are even better
replies.body_tagged: As much as I would love to bring bring back Nexus, not going to happen.  It was almost impossible to get another person to join.  Sometimes I would wait ten minutes for someone to join.  All we can hope now is the new game modes in Atlas are even better

replies.body: @Tarheelkiwi. Well not really. Lately my bro and I encouraged more people to play and constantly there'd be like 10 on a sever
replies.body_tagged: @Tarheelkiwi. Well not really. Lately my bro and I encouraged more people to play and constantly there'd be like 10 on a sever

replies.body: This won't work mainly for the fact that we are wasting performance and room with these servers because no one really plays them :l. If I saw an improvement in people wanting Nexus back I would talk to Staff about it. I used to love Nexus.

replies.body: no thanks had too many glitches and bugs and I doubt devs would want to work on it when they have atlas bringing in better updates and new things
replies.body_tagged: no thanks had too many glitches and bugs and I doubt devs would want to work on it when they have atlas bringing in better updates and new things

replies.body: Nexus was cool and all, but it wasn't played at all. It also has glitches like fast death/hit. So rip
